item.description: Hi there My name is Jan Steffen. 👋 I am from Oberems in Hessen, Germany. Find more information about myself below. Talks WeAreDevelopers DevOps Day 2021/11 - Monoskope: Developer Self-Service Across Clusters (Recording) Professional experience BWI GmbH 🌐 since 04/2023 | Lead IT Architect finleap connect GmbH 🌐 09/2021 - 04/2023 | Cloud Tech Lead 08/2020 - 09/2021 | Senior Cloud Engineer 06/2019 - 08/2020 | Platform Engineer AdVision digital GmbH 🌐 01/2017 - 06/2019 | Senior Software Engineer neveling.
